Comments_List: A continued discourse in the ethical conduct of research

This was a great course - very practical and interesting at the same time.  I learned a lot.  Some of the content was what I have learned in other places before, but other content was new and integral to our training.
We learned about the ethics behind clinical research
I particularly enjoyed the assigned reading of The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks

Slide presentations were so organized and helpful in laying out the topic.  I liked using the reflective essay assignment as a way to integrate the course's content in an interesting way - that was a fun and very useful assignment.
No weaknesses.
Great discussions!!! Great book for reading assignment :) thank you
yes, this should be a must for all graduate students
